me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api.gui

Class NumericGadget

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api.gui.Gadget
      • me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api.gui.ClickableGadget
        • me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api.gui.NumericGadget

  • public class NumericGadget
extends ClickableGadget
    A GUI gadget which allows an integer value to be displayed and changed.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  NumericGadget.NumericListener
      A callback to be executed when a numeric gadget is clicked.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NumericGadget

        public NumericGadget(InventoryGUI gui,
             int slot,
             String title,
             org.apache.commons.lang.math.IntRange range,
             int value,
             int incr,
             int altIncr,
             NumericGadget.NumericListener callback)
        Construct a numeric gadget.
        Parameters:
        gui - the GUI that the gadget belongs to
        slot - the GUI slot that the gadget occupies
        title - the label for the numeric gadget
        range - the range for the gadget
        value - the initial value for the gadget
        incr - the primary increment
        altIncr - the alternate increment
        callback - the code to run when the gadget is clicked
